creator: ssettles@visa.com
text:
########################################## adb stack trace ####################################

# adb /usr/local/apache2/bin/httpd ./core.httpd.34102.34102.1436473033
core file = ./core.httpd.34102.34102.1436473033 -- program ``/usr/local/apache2/bin/httpd'' on platform SUNW,Sun-Fire-280R
SIGSEGV: Segmentation Fault

SunOS ss73prodweb01 5.10 Generic_150400-23 sun4u sparc SUNW,Sun-Fire-280R

[Thu Jul 09 20:16:44.033411 2015] [core:notice] [pid 28860] AH00051: child pid 28861 exit signal Segmentation fault (11), possible coredump in /usr/local/apache2

ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE

./configure --with-apr=/usr/local/apache2/bin/apr-config --with-apr-util=/usr/local/apache2/bin/apu-config --with-ssl=/usr --with-mpm=prefork --enable-mpms-shared --enable-exception-hook --enable-access-compat --enable-authn-anon --enable-authn-dbm --enable-authz-dbm

####################### php-5.6.8 configure statement ###############################################################################

./configure --without-pdo-sqlite --without-sqlite3 --with-libdir=/lib/32 --prefix=/usr/local/php --with-apxs2=/usr/local/apache2/bin/apxs --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/apache2/conf --with-ldap=/usr --disable-phar --with-zlib  --with-mysql=/usr/local/mysql --with-mysqli=/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql_config --enable-mysqlnd --enable-debug

The crash is in mod_php -- not a module from the ASF httpd distribution. If you can reproduce w/o mod_php, reopen with the new data.
creator: covener@gmail.com
